breakthroughPP.players

Enum AbstractPlayer.State

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Enum<AbstractPlayer.State>
      • breakthroughPP.players.AbstractPlayer.State
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Comparable<AbstractPlayer.State>
    Enclosing class:
    AbstractPlayer

    public static enum AbstractPlayer.State
extends java.lang.Enum<AbstractPlayer.State>
    Possible states for the turn cycle state machine of every player. Initial state is init Request, confirm and update follow. Request tells a player to make a move and return it Confirm

    • Enum Constant Summary

      Enum Constants 
      Enum Constant and Description
      CONFIRM
      Player waits for his move to be confirmed by game engine / other player
      INIT
      Player is in initialization state
      REQUEST
      Player will be asked to choose a move
      UPDATE
      Player waits for the other player to do his move.
